reviews.Subject: Introduction to Computer Science
reviews.Review: Dr. Smith explains concepts clearly and provides excellent examples. However, the workload is heavy.

reviews.Subject: Data Structures
reviews.Review: Dr. Doe is an amazing teacher who really cares about her students. Her lectures are engaging and she is always available for help.

reviews.Subject: Algorithms
reviews.Review: Dr. Johnson is knowledgeable but her lectures can be hard to follow. The exams are tough but fair.

reviews.Subject: Operating Systems
reviews.Review: Dr. Brown's lectures are boring and the material is not well-organized. The grading is harsh.

reviews.Subject: Database Systems
reviews.Review: Dr. Davis provides clear explanations and practical examples. The course is well-structured, but the projects are challenging.

reviews.Subject: Software Engineering
reviews.Review: Dr. Wilson is passionate about teaching and makes the subject interesting. His real-world experience adds value to the course.

reviews.Subject: Artificial Intelligence
reviews.Review: Dr. Martinez is very knowledgeable and approachable. The assignments are tough but rewarding.

reviews.Subject: Machine Learning
reviews.Review: Dr. Anderson is an expert in the field, but his lectures can be dry. The course content is dense and requires a lot of self-study.

reviews.Subject: Computer Networks
reviews.Review: Dr. Taylor is an excellent professor who makes complex topics easy to understand. Her passion for the subject is contagious.

reviews.Subject: Cybersecurity
reviews.Review: Dr. Thomas is very thorough in his teaching. The course is challenging, but you learn a lot.
